Summary: Verified Purchaser of Cyclone Blend ~ By a Coffee Snob
text:
I purchased this on Amazon and have no association or affiliation with this company.

I was skeptical because of reviews but decided to give it a try since I LOVE my Keurig!

And we LOVE it! I like a nice bold cup but that is smooth... this is it! I always put
it on the 2nd cup setting (above the espresso size) for all of the K-cups for myself..
my husb puts it on the third setting. I made this coffee first for my husband on the
3rd setting and took a sip .... YUMMMY!!!!!! It was PERFECT... bold and smooth! I was
so excited! My husband took a sip and loved it too!

I am glad that I can have one good full cup on the third setting and not two cups of
Emeril's Bold (which I love too) or Green Mountain Italian Blend (which I LOVE too).

I did have one cup where some grounds were found on the top of the coffee... I was like
"Oh man... this is not good!!" I just took a paper towel and skimmed it and they came
right out and it hasn't happened since. And we've had about 8 cups of it all together.

I'm thinking that maybe with these cups you really do need to line them up right? Prob
not... maybe just growing pains for these guys.

Seems like a neat company and I will be buying the Cyclone again when we get close to
running out!

Please keep the price the way it is...!

Lisa
